lead_paragraph: Paul White is the fourth person to be suspended by the Financial Conduct Authority over misconduct related to the benchmark interest rate.

headline.main: British Regulator Bars Former R.B.S. Trader in Libor Case

snippet: Paul White is the fourth person to be suspended by the Financial Conduct Authority over misconduct related to the benchmark interest rate.
abstract: DealBook Online; Britain's Financial Conduct Authority says it has barred former Royal Bank of Scotland trader Paul White from financial services industry for misconduct involving manipulation of Libor interest rate.
